description: Try our easy to follow Bulgur Paella recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bulgur Paella Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and saut√© for 2 minutes. Add bulgur wheat and paprika and cook, stirring, for 1-2 minutes. Add three cups of water, stir well, cover and cook for 7 minutes. Stir through tomatoes and cook, uncovered, for a further 15-20 minutes or until bulgur wheat is tender.
Stir through peas, capsicum and tofu and season with pepper. Cook for a further 2 minutes or until tofu and vegetables are warmed through. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
